thread.section_title: Players Choice Videogames Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Players Choice Videogames | www.playerschoicevideogames.com
thread.title: Christopher Krug
thread.title_full: Players Choice Videogames reviewed by Christopher Krug

author: Christopher Krug
title: Christopher Krug
text: Pros...Finding Items is easy and website layout is pretty cool as well. Cons..only 1 i saw,and that is site does not specify if a item is new or used..there is nothing worse than purchasing an item you think is new and finding out it is used.
